name: Chess-Pool
description:
Chess-Pool is a wierd two player  mix of Chess and Pool, where you have to kick the enemy Queen of the Edge.

Controls:
Use W A S D to move the selected Pawn, moving into other Pawns kicks them. The amount of Tiles a Pawn moves is determent by the diceroll.

Credits:
I-Maser
Mirimell
